law.catch_line: Regulations on feeding of untreated garbage to swine -- Permit -- Inspections.
law.text: The Department of Agriculture shall promulgate regulations governing the feeding of garbage to swine. The department may conduct such inspections as are required to enforce this section.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 22, sec. 19, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 286, sec. 1, effective April 2, 1982.
